Room3: ^Certain Objects may be <color=#00d8ff>vital</color> to your success.
^In any scenario where you need something to proceed, you will be provided with a replacement as necessary in order to prevent getting stuck.

^In this room, we have 3 <color=#ff3600>exploding powder kegs</color> and one <color=#00d8ff>standard barrel</color>. While blowing up the powder kegs should result in destroying the target, the only necessary object in this scenario is the barrel.
^If you take any damage from the explosion, walk over the <color=#12bf00>green plus</color> to heal.
